name: deleteWorkflowMapping
description:
Deletes the workflow-issue type mapping for a workflow in a workflow scheme.

Note that active workflow schemes cannot be edited. If the workflow scheme is active, set `updateDraftIfNeeded` to `true` and a draft workflow scheme is created or updated with the workflow-issue type mapping deleted. The draft workflow scheme can be published in Jira.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

id.description: The ID of the workflow scheme.

updateDraftIfNeeded.description: Set to true to create or update the draft of a workflow scheme and delete the mapping from the draft, when the workflow scheme cannot be edited. Defaults to `false`.
